name: LightSDK
tagline: A open-sourced Mac application of ROBLOX Studio.
body:
### LightSDK.
Lua, a easy programming language, huh? Well; LightSDK improves that experience by giving you
the free and private world of programming and giving you more tools at your
fingertips. With the ROBLOX Studio core; publish your applications, and enjoy users using your
application.

### Unique.
Instead of creating a new Studio, we just created a studio from a studio. This core is
efficient and improved by us, and got it to the best quality and performance for free.
With advanced tools and simple tools, we were determined to get a high quality and
simplistic way to develop.

### Only Roblox application files?
If you don't like the ROBLOX open-source application library, you may publish your program into
a Corona or X-Code project with a few clicks. Add more plugins simply, by going to the "App-Store" to 
enjoy downloadable extensions.

### Distributors and License 
Since the LightSDK is a open-source project, with a large tools for your fingertips. You can
publish your application for no fees or anything! If you plan to distribute it online, however you must
acquire a open-source license to protect your program. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at our repository or post a issue on your repo and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
